summary: This is an email chain from August 27, 2019, regarding logistical planning for an Epstein-related court hearing. It involves coordination between law enforcement and victim advocates to escort victims from the SDNY (Southern District of New York) to the courthouse, manage press, and provide reserved seating.

events.title: Epstein Court Hearing
events.description: A court hearing related to the Jeffrey Epstein case was scheduled. Law enforcement and victim advocates coordinated to escort victims from the SDNY to the courthouse, provide reserved seating, and shield them from the press.

keyFacts: The email details logistical planning for an Epstein court hearing on August 28, 2019.
Law enforcement and victim advocates coordinated to escort victims, provide reserved seating, and shield them from the press.
Participants were instructed to wear suits, as directed by 'higher ups'.
The email chain involves the NYPD FBI Child Exploitation Human Trafficking Task Force.
The primary concern was managing victim movement and press interaction during a high-profile legal proceeding.
